# Sam Raw
<!--
@name: Sam Raw
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/notimp.png" valign="center" alt="Not implemented" title="Not implemented" /></div>

Play a raw sample from memory
## Parameters

- **voices**: A mask of bit, where bit 0 indicates voice 0, bit 1 voice 1 etc.
- **address**: The address of the sound samples, must be part of an AOZ memory bank
- **length**: The number of bytes to read
- **frequency**: The frequency at which to play, in Herz
---
